name: Redmund
description:
Controls

A or D / Left or Right - Movement

Left Mouse - Attack

Right Mouse - Activate Astral Gate

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Redmund is a side-scrolling action game made for Mini Jam 95, with the theme of CHANCE and the limitation of NO RANDOM NUMBER GENERATORS!

Assume the role of Redmund, an immortal hero who wanders time to help the defenseless. Defeating evil allows him to open astral gates to another age - though he may not know where it leads.

Feedback is always welcome. I hope you enjoy it, and thanks for playing!
